formatDescription: The Microsoft Project Export file or Microsoft Project Exchange file format is for earlier version of Microsoft Project to exhange project data with other Project Management software. Discontinued with Project 2000.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: v.120- New description added as part of PRONOM Research Week 2024. Submitted by Brigham Young University.

internalSignatures.name: Microsoft Project Export File 1.0
internalSignatures.note: Header: (MPX) ; list separator (e.g. a comma or semicolon), The name and version of the program used to create the MPX file; list separator; the version of MPX format that the file uses (1.0)
